Text: Sunday Morning HelpJpst BammelYoungFamilies ListBot Sponsor Start Your Own FREE Email List at linksjoinlb I will be out of town this weekend Would someone make sure the announcements are passed around etcSunday morning during class I will also be out of town next weekend so Ill need the same for next weekend Thanks Geoff To unsubscribe write to

FreedomBammelYoungFamilies ListBot Sponsor Start Your Own FREE Email List at linksjoinlb This is a statement that was read over the PA system at the football game at Roane County High School Kingston Tennessee by school Principal Jody McLoud on September I thought it was worth sharing with the world and hope you will forward it to all your friends It clearly shows just how far this country has gone in the wrong direction It has always been the custom at Roane County High School football games to say a prayer and play the National Anthem to honor God and Country Due to a recent ruling by the Supreme Court I am told that saying a prayer is a violation of Federal Case Law As I understand the law at this time I can use this public facility to approve of sexual perversion and call it an alternate lifestyle and if someone is offended thats OK I can use it to condone sexual promiscuity by dispensing condoms and calling it safe sex If someone is offended thats OK I can even use this public facility to present the merits of killing an unborn baby as a viable means of birth control If someone is offended no problem I can designate a school day as earth day and involve students in activities to religiously worship and praise the goddess mother earth and call it ecology I can use literature videos and presentations in the classroom that depict people with strong traditional Christian convictions as simple minded and ignorant and call it enlightenment However if anyone uses this facility to honor God and ask Him to bless this event with safety and good sportsmanship Federal Case Law is violated This appears to be inconsistent at best and at worst diabolical Apparently we are to be tolerant of everything and anyone except God and His Commandments Nevertheless as a school principal I frequently ask staff and students to abide by rules which they do not necessarily agree For me to do otherwise would be inconsistent at best and at worst hypocritical I suffer from that affliction enough unintentionally I certainly do not need to add an intentional transgression For this reason I shall Render unto Caesar that which is Caesars and refrain from praying at this time However if you feel inspired to honor praise and thank God and ask Him in the name of Jesus to bless this event please feel free to do so As far as I know thats not against the law yet ANDone by one the people in the stands bowed their heads held hands with one another and began to pray They prayed in the stands They prayed in the team huddles They prayed at the concession stand And they prayed in the announcers box The only place they didnt pray was in the Supreme Court of the United States of America the seat of justice in the one nation under God Somehow Kingston Tennessee remembered what so many have forgotten we are given the Freedom OF Religion not the Freedom FROM Religion Praise God that His remnant remains Lets Celebrate Jesus in Jesus said if you are ashamed of me I will be ashamed of you before my Father If you are not ashamed Pass this on but only if you mean it Yes I do Love God He is my source of existence and Savior He keeps me functioning each and every day Without Him I will be nothing Without him I am nothing but with Him I can do all things through Christ that strengthens me Phil Geoff Gayle Synergy Oil Gas Inc Office x Fax email To unsubscribe write to
